about_the_game:
The After Story of Lingua Fleur: Lily, telling the story of Yuyi and Yile living together, and of their college life.
This DLC contains two chapters of the story, totaling about 10,000 words and a new CG. We are using our new -diary- system to express this after story.

NOTE: This content is not voiced.
detailed_description:
The After Story of Lingua Fleur: Lily, telling the story of Yuyi and Yile living together, and of their college life.
This DLC contains two chapters of the story, totaling about 10,000 words and a new CG. We are using our new -diary- system to express this after story.

NOTE: This content is not voiced.
name: Lingua Fleur: Lily - Diary1

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10 (32/64bit)
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz Pentium 4
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: with DX10 (shader model 4.0)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Screen resolution: 1280 * 720+
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10 (32/64bit)
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz Pentium 4
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: with DX10 (shader model 4.0)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1.5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Screen resolution: 1280 * 720+

short_description: The After Storiy of Lingua Fleur: Lily, telling about 'Yuyi' & 'Yile' live together, and their college life. With new system -diary-, You can learn about the story in a variety of ways.
supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, German
